name: Lenore
description:
~~

Made by Team 2VC for the CPP GDDC's first annual Halloween Horror Jam

~~

Journey through a world that is not quite what it seems.  Old friends bring old betrayals and humanity harbors a terrifying secret that isn't meant to be known by the living. So watch your step and stay aware. 

The darkness beckons you, Lenore.

~~

DISCLAIMER: Be forewarned that there is a rather nasty bug that keeps you from closing the game. So don't panic! Just visit your local task manager and ask for a force quit. Thank you, and have a good day.

~~
